" "Night Vision Cam" by andro iX
Hint: Try to start with increasing the Gain.
Zoom will only work on devices which support it.
Hold your device very steady (especially for higher shutter times).
Multi-Threading will increase user interface performance. Single-Threading will slightly increase the frame rate on single core devices.
Pictures will be saved on sdcard in /NightVisionCam/.
"
